job_description:
Company: MobilePro
Position: Mobile Developer
Location: Los Angeles, CA
Salary: $115,000 - $145,000

About Us:
MobilePro creates innovative mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms. We strive to deliver exceptional user experiences. We are a team of passionate mobile developers.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Mobile Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing cross platform applications using React Native and Swift. The ideal candidate will have experience with mobile development, UI/UX design, and RESTful APIs.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
- Collaborate with designers and backend developers to deliver high-quality features.
- Write clean, testable, and well-documented code.
- Participate in code reviews and contribute to our development processes.

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
- 2+ years of experience in mobile development.
- Proficiency in React Native (preferred) or Swift or Kotlin.
- Experience with RESTful APIs.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with native mobile development (iOS or Android).
- Knowledge of UI/UX design principles.
- Familiarity with testing frameworks.

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Opportunity to work on exciting mobile projects.
- Collaborative and supportive work environment.
- Professional development opportunities.
